piquantly adverb
(EXCITING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an interesting and exciting way: The story is piquantly described in his three-volume biography. The events of the next few days were piquantly thrilling to the world at large.
More examplesFewer examplesHe writes piquantly about their affair.The fact that Satan was so piquantly portrayed, in a church, added an extra edge of relish to the occasion.The score is a ravishing web of memorable tunes, some nostalgic and weepy, others piquantly catchy.
